name: 2022 5th International Symposium on Computer Vision for Public Security
content: Publication: All submissions will be thoroughly peer-reviewed by experts based on originality, significance, innovation and clarity. All accepted and presented papers will be published in International Conference Proceedings Series, which will be archived at Online digital library, and will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
